pr_title: KAFKA-10679: [Streams] migrate kafka-site updated docs to kafka/docs

timeline.message: KAFKA-10679: Port streams kafka-site updated docs to kafka/docs
KAFKA-10679: Put back section in core-concepts.html from trunk version.
KAFKA-10679: Remove hard coded version, fix location of topology naming

timeline.bodyText: Hmm, is this supposed to match the output topic in L103 below? That one says "result-topic".
timeline.author: vvcephei

timeline.bodyText: Seems like this change is wrong. Suggested change As of 2.6.0 Kafka Streams deprecates KStream.through() if favor of the new KStream.repartition() operator As of 2.6.0 Kafka Streams deprecates KStream.through() in favor of the new KStream.repartition() operator
timeline.author: vvcephei
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -135,14 +134,12 @@

Streams API tasks to their new owners in the background. Check out KIP-441 for full details, including several new configs for control over this new feature.

-

New end-to-end latency metrics have been added. These task-level metrics will be logged at the INFO level and report the min and max end-to-end latency of a record at the beginning/source node(s) and end/terminal node(s) of a task. See KIP-613 for more information.

-

- As of 2.6.0 Kafka Streams deprecates KStream.through() in favor of the new KStream.repartition() operator + As of 2.6.0 Kafka Streams deprecates KStream.through() if favor of the new KStream.repartition() operator
